guide.introduction: This project extends Ken Murphy's timelapse camera project (Make v.21) by adding an extremal battery, solar panel, rudimentary charge controller, and daylight timer. This allows you to run the camera indefinitely, almost anywhere. The daylight timer turns the camera on at sunrise and off at night. With a 10w solar panel you can record an image every 5-10 minutes until the SD card gets full. If you have a good wifi connection in the area and an Eye-fi card, your camera will upload the pictures directly to a web server or your computer.
